document.full_text: commodities trader glencore's shares were stuck under water on their first day of official trade, dashing hopes of a strong start after it set a mid-range flotation price for london's largest ever offering.
document.title: glencore stuck below offer price on day one
lines_and_colors: commodities trader glencore's shares were stuck under water on their first day of official trade, dashing hopes of a strong start after it set a mid-range flotation price for london's largest ever offering.
